title: Spicy okra rocoto chilli curry
ingredients: ['oil, as needed for cooking', '1 onion, chopped', '1 (400g) tin KTC® okra', '2 fresh tomatoes, chopped', '1 teaspoon El Sabor de Casa® rocoto chilli paste', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '2 tablespoons water', 'chopped fresh coriander, to taste']
